ygData.subject: Cash and experience
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been hunting Snow Cougars in Iceclad for a level and a half. The experience is good, and whether solo or duo the time invested is about the same. Not
ygData.messageBody:
I have been hunting Snow Cougars in Iceclad for a level and a half.
The experience is good, and whether solo or duo the time invested is
about the same. Not bad, but I am not making any money.

Previously I farmed Brutes in Warsliks Woods. Nominal experience, but
made lots of cash.

Any ideas where I can go as a lvl 35 Druid to get a good balance of
cash/loot and experience? Mostly I solo, as I am usually in for an
hour at a time. Get in a few hours together now and then, but for
short sessions getting a group consumes most of the time available.

Barto Proudfoot
